docs.snippet: After four rain delays and 11 extra laps, Matt Kenseth finally drove to victory lane....
docs.lead_paragraph: After four rain delays and 11 extra laps, Matt Kenseth finally drove to victory lane.

headline.main: Matt Kenseth Ends 51-Race Drought With Win at Rainy Bristol
headline.print_headline: Matt Kenseth Ends 51-Race Drought With Win at Rainy Bristol

docs.snippet: Mrs. Nicholson was just 25 when she won a sports bet that paid more than £150,000, the equivalent today of about $4.5 million, and her life inspired a musical and a BBC television film....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Nicholson was just 25 when she won a sports bet that paid more than £150,000, the equivalent today of about $4.5 million, and her life inspired a musical and a BBC television film.
docs.abstract: Vivian Nicholson, a poor British factory worker who rose to international celebrity in 1961 after she and her husband won the Littlewoods Pools sports betting prize, equal to about $4.5 million, dies at age 79.

headline.main: Vivian Nicholson, 79, Dies; A Rags-to-Riches Story Left in Tatters
headline.print_headline: Vivian Nicholson, Rags-to-Riches-to-Rags Icon, Dies at 79

docs.snippet: The strain of getting young people to turn from their screens and look into other people’s eyes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The strain of getting young people to turn from their screens and look into other people’s eyes.
docs.abstract: Bruce Feiler This Life column discusses the difficulty of getting tech-obsessed children to turn away from their screens and make eye contact.

headline.main: Hey, Kids, Look at Me When We’re Talking

docs.snippet: Capitals goalie Braden Holtby wasn't sure what felt worse: Sitting out a playoff game because of an illness, or watching the Capitals fall behind the New York Islanders by two goals before rallying for a victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Capitals goalie Braden Holtby wasn't sure what felt worse: Sitting out a playoff game because of an illness, or watching the Capitals fall behind the New York Islanders by two goals before rallying for a victory.

headline.main: Capitals Goalie Holtby Healthy, Ready for Game 3 at Isles
headline.print_headline: Capitals Goalie Holtby Healthy, Ready for Game 3 at Isles
